short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension to download all images on any webpage by XSHERU

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: XIMGDOWN is an Chrome Extension which can be used to download all images on any webpage. You can use filter option as well as url find-replace option to prepare your image links and then download them all with a single click.
